title: PAY METHODS TO LOL
body:
I need help to know how i can pay money to lol without any card i mean am 17 year old and i have no card or anything like that yet cause of somereasons and i want to pay money in lol 1000 RP its like 10 or 13 dolar whatever is there any way to pay money to lol from shops or any super market like walmart i mean there some countries that have PayBox and that box have support to pay  money  to cs go and some few games and i ask if there anything like that and if i can pay money without card i also have steam acc and i have money on it but i dont know if riot supports that from steam to pay lol.... sorry for my English. i live in NJ so are any ways 

{{summoner:13}} {{item:3069}}

replies.body: We don't support any payments from Steam since League isn't associated with it at this time, but if you check out our [**Payment Methods FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590) you should be able to find a few different ways of getting RP like our prepaid cards. They're typically readily available at shops like Walmart!
Thanks ;) that really helpful i didnt knew if 7Elevel was supporting that.
